Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Reroute near 76th/Racine
ShortDescription: 75 74th-75th buses temp. rerouted WB 74th and Loomis; EB 74th and Racine : due to, street blockage near76th/Racine.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 76th/Racine due to street blockage near 76th/Racine.

Westbound buses will operate via 74th and Loomis including the normal route streets.

Eastbound buses will operate via 74th and Racine.

Allow extra travel time.
